headline: BIM in Construction Industry Research Report 2025-2034, Key Players Include Autodesk, Aveva Group, Hexagon, Oracle, and Procore Technologies
summary: The BIM in construction market is driven by rising construction demands, enhancing safety, and cost-efficiency through BIM adoption. Key opportunities include leveraging cloud-based and AI-integrated BIM for flexible, secure modelling, and meeting the trend of green buildings. Expanding market adoption is forecasted globally.
